## Source: ossf-package-analysis (347df55fc803786a1fe208d002d5f5728e402e41a100ae087bf8235c4ce584ab)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'shot2story' @ 99.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
